akas: Business in Russian World-wide (English title) (literal title)
akas from release info: Business in Russian World-wide (English title) (literal title)

1.title: Watermelons
1.plot: The Father in his laboratory creates new commercial product by crossing watermelons with cockroaches, but the new genetic creatures capture the World.

2.title: Russian Land
2.plot: Everybody in Russia know that Russian land is very rich by minerals, gas etc. So the father creates a company which sells to USA the Russian land in flower pots. Unfortunately he doesn't know anything yet about Russian bureaucracy.

3.title: Health Resort
3.plot: Tourist trade is in crisis, but for traveling and recreation one shouldn't go to Egypt or Turkey. Now the campers can rest in any place on the Earth, due to great number of decorations and special "actors" in the father's basement.

4.title: Pipeline
4.plot: The father finds out that city administration is trying to hide auction sales from citizens. By chance he detects one of such auctions and wins. But it turns out that he won servicing the pipeline that carries not a natural gas but sewage.

5.title: Trampolines
5.plot: The Father invents super-trampoline to get rid of traffic jams in Moscow and gives people a real opportunity to fly. Unfortunately this invention provokes the world crisis.

6.title: Smart House
6.plot: The Father creates artificial intelligence based on secret soviet technologies hidden inside of an old washing machine. The constructed robot-communist tries to take power over the whole world.

imdb.plot outline: The plot of the show is devoted to the vagaries of doing business in Russia. The protagonist - the Father, the eternal loser in each series is taken as an embodiment of another crazy business ideas (growing watermelons, crossed with cockroaches, the export of Russian land in flower pots, a project to get rid of traffic jams in Moscow by super-trampoline, etc.). Loser-entrepreneur is not burdened with a crust MBA and generally quite shallow - in business, he is guided not by knowledge of economics and management, and "pioneering fervor," that is valid optimistic, but disorganized. His dream is got riched without doing much effort (in the images of Russian life - "to sit on the pipe" to the end of life does not work). Pope's character can be called the archetypal Ivanushka-Durachok.

The plot of the show is devoted to specificity of business in Russia. The protagonist (Father) is an eternal loser. In each episode he tries to implement another crazy business idea, such as growing watermelons, crossed with cockroaches, exporting Russian land in flower pots, solving a problem of traffic jams in Moscow with help of super-trampoline, etc.::Anonymous
